metadata.title: CVE-2014-0010 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities inuser/profile/index.php in Moodle through 2.2.11, 2.3.x before 2.3.11, 2.4.xbefore 2.4.8, 2.5.x before 2.5.4, and 2.6.x before 2.6.1 allow remoteattackers to hijack the authentication of administrators for requests thatdelete (1) categories or (2) fields.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0010` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1').
